content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 Copper Ore, which is great. Now, I can proceed to smelt this Copper Ore into Copper Plates.

# First, I will insert some coal into the Stone Furnace to fuel it, and then I will insert the Copper Ore for smelting.

# Since I have 10 Copper Ore, I will insert 5 Copper Ore into the furnace for this batch, along with 2 coal for fuel.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert 2 coal into the Stone Furnace
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace

# I'll wait for the smelting process and check the outputs periodically.
for _ in range(20):  # Wait for a maximum of 10 seconds (checking every 0.5 seconds)
    sleep(0.5)  # Wait for the smelting process
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.CopperPlate, 0) >= 5:  # Check if enough Copper Plates have been produced
        break

# Check out the furnace's inventory and the overall inventory again
print(f"Furnace inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check furnace output
print(f"Inventory after copper smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory after copper smelting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
